_comment: MCP server configuration for Claude Code. Edit the paths and credentials below to match your setup. Remove any servers you don't use.

obsidian._comment: Obsidian MCP — edit the vault path to point to your Obsidian vault folder.
obsidian._requires: Node.js (npm/npx). No separate install needed — npx downloads it on first run.

zotero._comment: Zotero MCP — edit your API key and library ID. Get these from https://www.zotero.org/settings/keys
zotero._setup: https://github.com/54yyyu/zotero-mcp — install with: uv tool install "git+https://github.com/54yyyu/zotero-mcp.git"

google-docs-mcp._comment: Google Docs MCP — edit the path to point to where you cloned and built the server.
google-docs-mcp._requires: Node.js. Clone the repo, run 'npm install' and 'npm run build'.
google-docs-mcp._setup: https://github.com/a-bonus/google-docs-mcp — also requires Google Cloud OAuth setup (see repo README).
